      • DefaultButtonBarListener

        public DefaultButtonBarListener(ButtonBarDialog dialog,
                                java.lang.String helpCode)
        Creates a bar-listener with reference to a dialog's button bar and by defining a help dialog associated. The help-ID refers to a text element in DISPLAY bundle.
        Parameters:
        dialog - ButtonBarDialog dialog containing the button bar
        helpCode - String the id-string of the help dialog available through the button bar; may be null since 0-5-0 since 0-6-0 modified parameter list

    • Method Detail

      • getDialog

        public ButtonBarDialog getDialog()

      • okButtonPerformed

        public boolean okButtonPerformed()
        Description copied from interface: ButtonBarListener
        Performs actions associated to the "OK" button of the button bar. The return value is normally false if some pre-condition of operation has failed, including a possible abortion by the user.
        Specified by:
        okButtonPerformed in interface ButtonBarListener
        Returns:
        boolean true indicating that operations were performed as regarded "normal", false indicating that operation has been broken by some cause

      • extraButtonPerformed

        public boolean extraButtonPerformed(java.lang.Object button)
        Description copied from interface: ButtonBarListener
        Performs a user supplied (additional) button. The returned boolean controls whether the button will be enabled or disabled after termination of this method.
        Specified by:
        extraButtonPerformed in interface ButtonBarListener
        Returns:
        boolean button enable status (true = enabled)
